channel.title: How do i make it so i can spawn silab items?

item.title: How do i make it so i can spawn silab items?
item.dc:creator: @adog17x adog17x
item.description:
@adog17x wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 1)) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such god damn item."); } } else { sendMessage("Fuck you, type it right, your pissing me off... :D"); } }

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make it so i can spawn silab items?

item.title: How do i make it so i can spawn silab items?
item.dc:creator: @taylor55 taylor55
item.description:
@taylor55 wrote:

[quote=“For ( ; ; ), post:7, topic:192049”][quote author=Evanz link=topic=255750.msg2129729#msg2129729 date=1206271311]
Use this:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights > 1)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Please Try Again..."); }
}

[/quote]

Don’t use that.

Go find my tutorial about string splitting and use that.[/quote]

sry but im a total idiot when it comes to that stuff

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make it so i can spawn silab items?
item.dc:creator: @Evanz Evanz
item.description:
@Evanz wrote:

Use this:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights > 1)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Please Try Again..."); }
}
